condition: [AND](<*ATTDEF(Orion Console 2Position Base Unit (0-20))*>,<*ATTDEF(Orion Console 3Position Base Unit (0-20))*>)
name: Set_Orion_2p_3p_Total
action:
<*ASSIGNVALUE(Orion Console 2Position Base Unit (0-20):<* Eval(<*VALUE(Orion_2P_Base_Unit_Left)*> + <*VALUE(Orion_2P_Base_Unit_Left_Right)*> + <*VALUE(Orion_2P_Base_Unit_No_Left_Right)*> + <*VALUE(Orion_2P_Base_Unit_Right)*>) *>)*>
<*ASSIGNVALUE(Orion Console 3Position Base Unit (0-20):<* Eval(<*VALUE(Orion_3P_Base_Unit_Left)*> + <*VALUE(Orion_3P_Base_Unit_Left_Right)*> + <*VALUE(Orion_3P_Base_Unit_No_Left_Right)*> + <*VALUE(Orion_3P_Base_Unit_Right)*>) *>)*>
